active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the security vs. usability trade-offs of split tunneling versus full tunneling. When might split tunneling be justified with mitigations? (Addresses misconceptions on performance benefits ignoring risks like data exfiltration).
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs: Student A diagrams split tunneling risks and NIST SP 800-171 Requirement 3.13.7 compliance; Student B teaches back configuration retention strategies using examples/non-examples (e.g., AnyConnect full tunnel policy). Switch roles.
active_learning.problem_solving: Real-world scenario: Analyze a breach caused by split tunneling (e.g., malware phoning home via external network); teams propose policy, MDM enforcement, and monitoring solutions for CMMC audit prep.
